Package dog.giraffe.threads

Class BatchRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • dog.giraffe.threads.BatchRunner
  • public class BatchRunner
extends java.lang.Object
    Schedules tasks of a Batch for execution. If any task fails the rest of the tasks of the batch will not be executed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static <T> void runMultiThreaded​(Batch<T> batch, Context context, int parallelism, Continuation<java.lang.Void> continuation)
      Runs all tasks of batch.
      static <T> void runParallelSingleThreaded​(Batch<T> batch, Context context, Continuation<java.lang.Void> continuation)
      Runs all tasks of batch.
      static <T> void runSingleThreaded​(Batch<T> batch, Context context)
      Runs all tasks of batch.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • runMultiThreaded

        public static <T> void runMultiThreaded​(Batch<T> batch,
                                        Context context,
                                        int parallelism,
                                        Continuation<java.lang.Void> continuation)
                                 throws java.lang.Throwable
        Runs all tasks of batch. All tasks can use all threads of the executor of the context.
        Parameters:
        parallelism - the maximum number of tasks that can be run in parallel
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable

      • runParallelSingleThreaded

        public static <T> void runParallelSingleThreaded​(Batch<T> batch,
                                                 Context context,
                                                 Continuation<java.lang.Void> continuation)
                                          throws java.lang.Throwable
        Runs all tasks of batch. Every thread of the executor of the context is used to run a tasks but the tasks will use one thread only.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable

      • runSingleThreaded

        public static <T> void runSingleThreaded​(Batch<T> batch,
                                         Context context)
                                  throws java.lang.Throwable
        Runs all tasks of batch. All tasks will be run in the thread of the caller.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable
